pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detect Anomalies Using the Spectral Residual Algorithm // Apply the spectral residual algorithm to data, such as a time series, to detect anomalies. Anomaly scores can be used to determine outliers based upon a threshold or fed into more sophisticated prediction models. Methods are based upon "Time-Series Anomaly Detection Service at Microsoft", Ren, H., Xu, B., Wang, Y., et al., (2019) doi:10.48550/arXiv.1906.03821.
